actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to provide financial aid for local fire departments in the purchase of firefighting suits and self-contained breathing apparatus.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to local fire departments to pay up to 90 percent of the cost of purchasing heat-protective fire fighting suits and breathing apparatus. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial aid for local fire departments in the purchase of firefighting suits and self-contained breathing apparatus.
